# Cacao ranas explore

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

ranas <- read_csv("data/ranas.csv")
```

simple ind caught for each site - just look at number new ind caught
```{r}
ranas %>%
  filter(Recap == "N") %>%
  group_by(Sitio) %>%
  summarize(count = n_distinct(Numero)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(Sitio, count)) +
  geom_col()
```
